effects.name: Continuous Rain
effects.description: In this area it rains almost constantly. Only a few days a year may be without rain. It is rather depressing. And wet.

effects.name: Permanent Fog
effects.description: A strange and eerie feeling overcomes anyone who enters this fog. The fog stays at all times.

effects.name: Strong Thunderstorms
effects.description: The thunderstorms in this region are very destructive. With powerful lightning and roaring thunder.

effects.name: Monsoon
effects.description: The monsoon is a seasonal weather effect. Once a year the area is flooded in rain. The rest of the year is very dry.

effects.name: Strong Blizzard
effects.description: Stronger blizzard haunt this area. It is very cold, impossible to navigate with deadly ice shards slicing up any lost souls.

effects.name: Strong Sandstorms
effects.description: Stronger sandstorms haunt this area. It is very hot, impossible to navigate with deadly glass shards slicing up any lost souls.

effects.name: Blood Rain
effects.description: It rains blood. The blood is of unknown origin. But nobody likes it.

effects.name: Extreme Heat Waves
effects.description: The area experiences extreme heat waves during the warm seasons.
